name: Goatfloyd is Here DX
description:
WARNING: This game contains FLASHING LIGHTS, LOUD NOISES, and lots of JUMPSCARES!

WE WANT YOU!

Do you have what it takes to impeach Super President Goatfloyd? Violently if necessary?? Goatfloyd's mastery of time and space ensures that no two visits to his Giganaut Whitehouse Fortress are the same! This DELUXE version has updated graphics, over 30 characters, multiple endings, and all sorts of secret goodies! So come on in and make yourself at home, but just remember, you're never alone...

...GOATFLOYD IS HERE!
